page.title: 02INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: MRS PRITCHARD IS 88 YEARS OF AGE. SHE LIVES IN THE ADRESS OF 1 THE BUTHAY WICKWAR.WHEN MRS PRITCHARD WAS 3 SHE WENT TO THE INFANTS SCHOOL WHICH IS NOW A YOUTH CLUB. SHE WORE BOOTS WITH A BROWN DRESS WHICH HAD A PINAFORE OVER IT. AT THE AGE OF 5 SHE LEFT THE INFANTS SCHOOL TO THE GIRLS SCHOOL WHICH IS NOW THE PARISH HALL.WHICH SHE LEFT AT THE AGE OF 14.IN THE MORNINGS OF THE GIRLS SCHOOL MRS PRITCHARD LEARNED ENGLISH,GEOGRAPHY,MATHS AND HISTORY IN THE AFTERNOONS SEWING AND DRAWING AND AT PLAY TIMES NETBALL AND DANCE AROUND THE MULBERRY BUSH AND HOCKEY.SHE MARRIED AT THE AGE OF 25 AND HAD SIX CHILDREN.HER HUSBAND WAS ONE OF THE FIRST MEN WHO STARTED WORK IN THE QUARRY 60 YEARS AGO.MRS PRITCHARD HAD A HAPPY LIFE IN WICKWAR.
